name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 16, Shanghai. The video of "Agricultural Bank of China on Luxi Road robbed a bank" circulated online shows that the ATM was emitting billowing white smoke, and a man was holding a gun-like object next to the ATM.
The person who filmed it said: "This guy is bombing the bank, he has a gun in his hand, run, don't look at it" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891153764670955520/pu/img/KXGB2oPAkqoXYGFH.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another netizen posted a picture showing the police handling the situation at the scene. He said: "It seems that you are fully prepared, robbing a bank late at night and bringing smoke bombs" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6_BKnaMAALPAB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The video is being deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6_oAEaYAAPZ1m.jpg

content:

On February 16, after we published the report on the tiger shooting in Feng Village, Xi'an, the police force was significantly reduced during today's tiger shooting. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj6_dUmWEAA-Eye.png

content: February 15 (Released) Liaoning. The patient said that when taking the Qingrejiedu Capsules produced by Shaanxi Buchang Pharmaceutical Company, he found that after breaking the capsules, the inside was actually hollow and there was no powder. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891169563796271104/pu/img/Zy9MAuJmbvNpvw22.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 15, Foreign Minister Wang Yi said: Some countries may not know that China and Ukraine have long established a bilateral strategic partnership. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891174665617563648/pu/img/iH8nP4wkkf_pTklm.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the 16th local time, US Middle East envoy Witkoff said that he will travel to Saudi Arabia tonight with National Security Advisor Mike Waltz to discuss how to end the Ukrainian war. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj7WQ84bUAAipZx.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, schools across the country have begun to cancel evening self-study courses https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj7YFiWXoAAYVfa.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Police and firefighters went to the crime scene https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891191780512604160/pu/img/H397bvyIrwQc5KDT.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Speaking on NBC News' "Meet the Press," Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky made it clear that he would never accept a U.S.-Russia peace deal without Ukraine.
"I will never accept any decision made by the United States and Russia regarding Ukraine, never," Zelensky said. "This is a war in Ukraine, against us, and we are paying with our lives."
Zelensky thanked Trump and other U.S. leaders for their support for Ukraine, but added that there is no "leader in the world who can make a deal with Putin without us."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
The "611" overtime study system is a blessing to students at the South Campus of Shangyou Middle School in Shangyou County, Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province. Now, the third year of high school has only Saturday night off in the second semester.
"For decades, our school has only half a day off every Saturday afternoon from the first year to the third year of high school. The daily study time is from 6:55 in the morning to about 10 o'clock in the evening (adjusted according to the season), up to 15 hours."
Last summer vacation, due to corruption in the education system, the inspection team of the Commission for Discipline Inspection intervened, and each grade briefly enjoyed a double break. However, once the news passed, the third year of high school immediately returned to its original state, and the vacation for the first and second years of high school also changed from half a day to a full day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution: Situation related to the Shenyang Dadong non-staple food explosion
The explosion took place in a downtown area, very close to the city's largest commercial district. Every time we entered, there were 3-4 police cars guarding the entrance. On the day of the explosion, some people wanted to go to Dadong Grocery Store to buy things, but turned back home halfway after hearing the news of the explosion. When he returned home that night, he received a call from the police asking him if he had been there and asking him to delete all the photos.
Another person was just a few hundred meters away from the explosion and had just driven away from the place in the afternoon when he also received a phone call from the police, asking him not to leak any photos or information.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump said that if Russia wants to continue fighting in Ukraine, it will be a big problem for the United States because they have a strong military force. "I think he (referring to Putin) wants to stop fighting... You should understand this. They defeated Hitler, they defeated Napoleon. They have been fighting for a long time and have done it before. But I think he wants to stop fighting. This is the question I ask him, because if he continues to fight, it will be a big problem for us. And it will also cause me a lot of trouble."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, it was reported online that a teacher at Wenzhou Baililu Primary School hanged himself in the classroom on the first day of school, triggering mourning among netizens.
It is said that the teacher was a Chinese teacher who was about to retire. Because the principal implemented the last-place elimination this semester, the teachers in the worst-performing classes would be disqualified from the year-end evaluation and their salaries would be deducted, which led to the art teacher on the first floor committing suicide due to the heavy workload.
Some netizens said that they went to the gate of Wenzhou Baililu Primary School to send flowers to mourn, but several staff members snatched their phones and deleted the photos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video of an ambulance rushing to rescue a teacher at Baililu Primary School in Wenzhou after she committed suicide. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891279352228184064/pu/img/J1ZFcN4ClqW3rpaG.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of February 16, netizens took a photo of a police car stationed at the gate of Wenzhou Baili Road Primary School https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1891280498791518208/pu/img/pDO8SCd69GU0B25o.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some teachers said that no one really cares about their situation. They hope that the warnings gained by teachers with their blood and lives will not be suppressed again and again. They called for "no one can be trusted behind the teachers. Only by uniting and speaking out can we win more living space for ourselves." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj8twcDWQAA5TqG.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of February 17, more flowers were placed at the entrance of Baili Road Primary School https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gj8-NPbWMAAgeZo.jpg
